name: 101 Bex Smooth Leather Ankle Boots - Unisex

features: Made for police officers. Subverted by rebels. The 101 boot packs all our unmistakable DNA into a sleek 6-eye silhouette
Hardwearing and famously tough, our Smooth leather can be polished to shine or scuffed-up. It’s up to you. Clean with a damp cloth and care with Dr. Martens Shoe Polish
Our Goodyear-welted lines are heat-sealed at 700°C and reinforced with our signature welt stitch
tech_specs.\u2022 Material: Durable and famously stiff to start, our Smooth Leather can be polished to a dapper shine or artfully scuffed-up depending on your preference. Restores and rejuvenates with no polish or shine: our Wonder Balsam is formulated to keep leather strong and supple, and ensure your boots last even longer.
